text: , born Wang Cenjing (), is a Chinese-born Japanese basketball player. She became a naturalized Japanese citizen in 2013 and represented Japan in the basketball competition at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:Japanese women's basketball players Category:Basketball players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic basketball players of Japan Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Chinese women's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Tianjin Category:Naturalized citizens of Japan Category:Expatriate basketball people in Japan Category:Chinese emigrants to Japan Category:Japanese people of Chinese descent
title: Asako O
